["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["Solus 是一个界面美观，对新手友好的 Linux 发行版，使用 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"eopkg"}]," 作为包管理器。"]}],"
",["$r","ul",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":["项目地址：",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://getsol.us","rel":"nofollow","children":"https://getsol.us"}]]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"使用方法","children":"使用方法"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"执行以下命令"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}eopkg add-repo Mirror {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/shannon/eopkg-index.xml.xz"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"此后，之行以下命令以启用 Mirror 源，禁用官方源"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}eopkg enable-repo Mirror
{{sudo}}eopkg disable-repo Solus","codeLanguage":"shell"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"或者用 Mirror 源直接覆盖官方源"}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"{{sudo}}eopkg add-repo Solus {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/shannon/eopkg-index.xml.xz"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["关于 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"eopkg"}]," 命令的详细用法，请执行 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"eopkg help"}]," 查看帮助。"]}]]}]

meta.title: Solus 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
